effect.shortEffect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
effect.full: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

description.black-white: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
description.black-2-white-2: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
description.x-y: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
description.sun-moon: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
description.sword-shield: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
